faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about dream analysis

q1.question: Is dream analysis scientifically proven?
q1.answer: Yes, dream analysis is backed by psychology research and has been used in therapy for decades. Our AI combines traditional psychological methods with modern technology.

q2.question: How accurate is the AI analysis?
q2.answer: Our AI is trained on extensive psychological research and dream symbolism databases. While interpretations are personalized, they provide valuable insights for self-reflection.

q3.question: Is my dream data private and secure?
q3.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption and never share your personal data. Your dreams are private and secure.

q4.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
q4.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. No long-term commitments required.

chat.placeholder: Describe your dream or ask a question...

suggestedQuestions.title: Suggested questions:
questions: What does it mean when I dream about flying?
Why do I keep having the same dream?
How can I remember my dreams better?
What does it mean to dream about animals?

chat.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your AI Dream Interpreter. I'm here to help you understand the hidden meanings in your dreams. What would you like to explore today?

aiResponses.flying: Flying dreams are fascinating! They often represent a desire for freedom, liberation from constraints, or gaining a new perspective on life. The feeling of soaring can indicate feelings of empowerment and the ability to rise above challenges.
aiResponses.water: Water in dreams is deeply symbolic and typically represents emotions, the unconscious mind, and spiritual cleansing. The state of the water often reflects your emotional state.
aiResponses.chase: Chase dreams are among the most common dream themes and usually indicate avoidance or anxiety about something in your waking life.
aiResponses.animals: Animals in dreams often represent our instincts, primal desires, or aspects of our personality. Different animals carry different meanings.
aiResponses.generic: That's a very interesting dream! Dreams are highly personal and their meanings can vary based on your life experiences, emotions, and current circumstances.
